subject: Football
College Athletics
Stadiums and Arenas
Bowl Games
Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The turf problems that affected a football game at Yankee Stadium in November have been addressed (with thicker, heavier sod) ahead of Friday’s Pinstripe Bowl.
snippet: The turf problems that affected a football game at Yankee Stadium in November have been addressed (with thicker, heavier sod) ahead of Friday’s Pinstripe Bowl.
